attributes.additional_details:
Individual entries for Scotland, Northern Ireland, England and Wales at Eurovision from now on!
-	Each funded by TV station per country
-	Songs voted for by the public at song festivals promoting new music and not mass production or BBC choosing for us or offering terrible acts
-	End BBC monopoly and sole rights from EBU to do this
-	By doing this let each country showcase their talents, sole, music, culture, fashion, performance and flare to promote tourism and reputation on one of the largest world stages e.g. celtic music, london fashion
-	UK contributes a lot of money to support acts in other countries but not at home and no one in uk is engaged in our acts – if we showcase each country properly - as we have the talent and the money - the money spent broadcasting will be returned with tourism, pride, engagement and passion
